description:
Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

Wattpad Premium:
- Subscribe to Wattpad Premium for uninterrupted ads-free reading and first access to new features
– Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
– Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
– Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the cost of the chosen package
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- For full terms of service, visit https://www.wattpad.com/terms
- For our privacy policy, visit https://www.wattpad.com/privacy
– Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Already a Wattpad fan? Follow us on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook and Twitter to stay up-to-date on your favorite writers, stories, contests, and more!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wattpad/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wattpad
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wattpad/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wattpad

• Litres: Books - a huge library in Estonian, English, Lithuanian, Latvian, Russian and other languages. 
• All the latest international bestsellers 
• The #1 reading app in the App Store 
• Over 10 million of happy customers
• The largest catalog — over 250,000 books 
Welcome to Litres! It’s a great way to read your favorite books on your iPhone or iPad.

 
For you:

· Access to 600,000 books and audiobooks in your favorite genres: fantasy, science fiction, business, Russian literature, DIY, romance, mystery, action, business, self-improvement, psychology, and much more.
· The first 20% of any book is free. What if you don’t like it? Read and choose which books to get.
· The hottest new releases. Be the first! Most new releases appear in the Litres catalog at the same time the paper book is released.
· Over 32,000 free books — read to your heart's content!
· Enter regularly-scheduled drawings and win valuable prizes for registered Litres users.
 
Special features:

· Your books are always with you — all the books you have purchased are available to you on all your devices (as long as you use the same account)
· Start reading on your iPhone, pick up where you left off on your iPad! All your bookmarks will be synced across all your devices and the Litres online reader (as long as you use the same account)
· The convenient search function lets you search for books based on various criteria. Do you only know the author's last name? Or are you trying to find a new fantasy novel to read? Our search function can help!
· You can sign up in a single tap using your social network account
 
To select a book:

· Read large free excerpts before you buy the book (up to 20% of the book)
· Read book reviews by other users or write your own
· Study the author's official web page with biographies, critiques, and easy access to series of books
 
While reading, you can:

· add the pages you need to your bookmarks
· see how many pages you’ve read and how many you have left
· fine-tune your reading experience for maximum comfort — adjust book background, screen brightness, and font size
· access your entire library in offline mode even when roaming or outside a network area (you will have to download the books beforehand)
· enable nighttime reading mode with a single button
  
If you like a book, you can:

· buy it with a single tap or put it in your cart and buy it later from your current device or a different one
· share information about the book with your friends on a social network
 
Get access to the best books and read online. Enjoy authors such as:

Boris Akunin, E. L. James, Alexandra Marinina, Sergei Lukyanenko, Darya Dontsova, Dina Rubina, Tatyana Ustinova, Roman Zlotnikov, Jojo Moyes, Tatyana Polyakova, George R. R. Martin, Vadim Panov, Sergei Tarmashev, Dmitrii Glukhovsky, Elena Zvyozdnaya, Stephen King, Max Frye, Maria Metlitskaya, Oleg Roi, Andrei Kruz, Yekaterina Vilmont, Donna Tartt, Zakhar Prilepin, Artyom Kamenisty, Dan Brown, Viktor Pelevin, James Rollins, Robert Galbraith, Vadim Zeland, Dmitrii Bykov, Alexander Mazin, Erich Maria Remarque, Anna and Sergei Litvinov, Natalya Zhiltsova, Dmitrii Rus, Jo Nesbø, Anna Gavrilova, Irene Kao, Viktoria Tokareva, Alexander Pushkin, Anton Chekhov, Fyodor Dostoevsky, Leo Tolstoy, Ivan Turgenev. Most popular books - Anna Karenina, War and Peace, Crime and Punishment, The Brothers Karamazov, Fathers and Sons.
 
Note: the Litres app may collect anonymous usage statistics.

**Here's what's waiting for you**

- 20000+ amazing stories here in one app, with special daily recommendations

- A rich interactive reading experience - share your thoughts and discuss plots with authors and the community.
- Unlimited reading experience - more new books hit the shelf every month!

**Massive Tags. Help you locate your favorite books in 5 minutes**
Fantasy, Royal Romance, Dark Romance, Werewolf & luna, Supernatural, Dragon, Vampire, Billionaire, Mafia and so on. We got it all!

Welcome to 1000Kitap, the Social Network for Books!

Established in 2012, 1000Kitap aims to encourage everyone to read at least 1000 books. 1000Kitap recognizes the importance of books and reading and aims to spread this awareness to even more people. To access all the features of 1000Kitap, you can visit the website '1000kitap.com.'

With 1000Kitap, you can create your own world of books. You can have a personal book archive and view the archives of other people. Just like with other activities, reading multiplies when shared. By sharing what you read, you can inform others and benefit from their knowledge.

Poetry, novels, short stories, science fiction... You can find everything about books on 1000Kitap. 1000Kitap is your virtual library.

What can you do on 1000Kitap?

You can take notes on the books you've read.
You can take notes on the books you intend to read.
You can set reading goals and track their progress.
You can like books and see the books you've liked later.
You can make quotations from the books you've read or read quotations made by others.
If you're thinking of reading or curious about a book, you can search for it and see how many people have read it. Likes, comments, and reviews of the book can give you an idea.
You can rate books and articles.
You can write book reviews. You can also see the book reviews made by others. This way, people can decide what to read based on each other's reviews. Additionally, when reading a book, they can notice details they might have missed.
On 1000Kitap, the social network for books, you can share posts related to the books you've read. You can also like posts made by others. This is one of the most informative social networks. :)
You can write comments on people's posts and make new friends.
If you can't decide what to read, our book recommendations generated according to your profile's algorithm can help you. Our recommendations can change based on the books you've read and liked, the comments you've made, and your quotations.
You can meet other readers like you and talk about the books you've read.
1000Kitap is a social network application centered around books.
Is 1000Kitap Free?
1000Kitap is a free application that aims to promote reading.

Can I Read Books on 1000Kitap?
Currently, you cannot read books on 1000Kitap. However, you can access comments and experiences of people who have read the book you are considering.

We continue to work to make 1000Kitap more enjoyable for you. Our goal is to popularize reading and strengthen people's relationship with books. Remember, books are our truest friends. :)

1000Kitap Premium:
As a 1000Kitap Premium subscriber, you can use 1000Kitap without advertisements. Additionally, a symbol indicating your support for 1000Kitap will be displayed next to your name.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.1000kitap.com/hakkinda/gizlilik-politikasi

Terms of Use:
https://www.1000kitap.com/hakkinda/kullanim-sartlari

Elibre – Oxumağın ən rahat yolu

Elibre sənin şəxsi rəqəmsal kitabxanandır. Burada minlərlə kitabı kəşf edə, müəllifləri izləyə, oxuduqlarını istədiyin formada işarələyə və dostlarınla paylaşa bilərsən. Oxuma təcrübəsini daha zəngin və peşəkar etmək üçün Elibre daim təkmilləşdirilir.

 Əsas imkanlar:

 Kitabxana və axtarış – minlərlə kitab arasında sürətli və dəqiq axtarış et
 Müəllif izləmə – sevdiyin müəlliflərin yeni əsərlərindən xəbərdar ol
 Oxuma təcrübəsi – səhifələmə, şrift və ölçü seçimi ilə rahat oxu
 Dərhal tərcümə – istədiyin mətn hissəsini seç və anında tərcümə et
 Annotasiya və əlfəcinlər – qeydlər apar, maraqlı fikirləri işarələ və saxla
 Kitab istəyi – istədiyin kitabı tətbiqdən birbaşa istək olaraq göndər
 Sosial imkanlar – dostlarını dəvət et, birlikdə oxumağın dadını çıxar
 Performans və dizayn – sürətli, modern və istifadəsi rahat interfeys

Welcome to a wide world of wonderful audiobooks, ebooks, and things that aren’t books but are still pretty great.

Storytel is home to beloved stories, in-depth podcasts, and exclusive Storytel Originals.

Whether you listen or read, you’ll find the right story for any moment.

• Explore a massive library of stories in English and other languages
• Jump freely from story to story until you find one you love
• Build your bookshelf and get personalized recommendations
• Find what fits your mood, like crime, feel-good, or self-development
• Follow your favorite authors and series
• Browse and share reviews and reactions
• Try out that book your friend keeps talking about
• Discover what’s trending in the culture

LISTEN AND READ YOUR WAY

• Listen to audio stories on your iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch and CarPlay
• Stream stories or download them for later
• Switch between listening and reading anywhere in a book
• Listen at your own pace: regular, sped up, or slowed down
• Set bookmarks and attach your thoughts as notes
• Drift off to dreamland with the sleep timer
• Spare those pretty eyes with Dark Mode
• See your stats and set a Listening Goal

KIDS MODE INCLUDED

• Let your kid find adventure in a space with just children’s stories
• Show or hide children’s books in your bookshelf
• Set your own pin code for parental control

HOW IT WORKS

Storytel is available in 25+ countries, including both local and international story treasures in different languages. A subscription gives you access to our ever-growing library of audiobooks, ebooks, and other stories.

In-app subscriptions will be charged via your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of the subscription period unless auto renewal is turned off in your iTunes account settings at least 24 hours before your subscription period runs out.

When a free trial is offered, we will ask you to add a payment method when starting the trial. But don't worry – if you cancel before the last day of the trial you won't be charged.

The content, languages and subscriptions available may vary by region. Some titles and offers shown above may not be available in your country or selected subscription plan.

Terms and conditions: https://www.storytel.com/documents/terms-and-conditions

Privacy policy: https://www.storytel.com/documents/privacy-policy

Questions? Feedback? Speak to a real person! Reach us at support@storytel.com

Şübhəsiz ki, bu tərcümə insan əməyinin nəticəsidir. Demək, burada xətaların olması da labüddür. Odur ki, öz düzəlişlərini, qeyd və mülahizələrini tafsirazeri@gmail.com elektron ünvanına göndərəcək oxuculara əvvəlcədən təşəkkürümüzü bildiririk. Sizin dəyərli məsləhətləriniz bu kitabın gələcək nəşrlərində mütləq nəzərə alınacaqdır.

Proqramın yığılmağında əsas məqsəd hər kəsin bu proqramın imkanlarından rahat istifadə edə bilməsi və Quran təfsiri kitablarının geniş kütlə arasında yayılmasına nail olmaqdır. Uca Allah bu işi hər birimiz üçün xeyirli və bərəkətli etsin.

Meloshort: Your Ultimate Destination for Popular Short Dramas and Must-Watch Mini-Series

In today’s fast-paced world, finding time to unwind and enjoy quality entertainment can be a challenge. That’s where Meloshort comes in — the ultimate app designed specifically for busy viewers like you, who crave engaging stories but have limited time. With episodes lasting just 1 to 2 minutes, Meloshort offers a vast and diverse library of popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series that perfectly fit into your fragmented schedule.
Whether you are commuting, grabbing a quick coffee break, or just squeezing in some entertainment between daily tasks, Meloshort lets you dive into cinematic-quality storytelling anytime, anywhere. Experience the grandeur of ancient costume dramas, the sweetness and charm of modern romances, the thrill of intense boss hero stories, or the gripping suspense of revenge thrillers — all in beautifully produced HD formats that bring these worlds to life on your screen.

Diverse Genres to Match Every Mood
Our ever-expanding collection covers a rich variety of genres, ensuring there is something for everyone:
- Sweet Pet Romance: Heartwarming stories filled with adorable love and tender moments.
- Emotional Sadomasochistic Passion: Complex, intense relationships full of raw emotion and drama.
- Thrilling Suspense Mysteries: Edge-of-your-seat narratives packed with twists and turns.
- Heartfelt Campus Stories: Relatable tales of youth, friendship, and first love.
- Urban Emotional Dramas: Deeply engaging stories that explore the complexities of modern city life.
With new episodes and series added every week, your watchlist will never run dry. Our smart recommendation engine learns your tastes and suggests fresh content tailored just for you, helping you discover your next favorite popular short drama or must-watch mini-series effortlessly.

Features Tailored for Your Viewing Pleasure
Meloshort isn’t just about great stories — it’s about making your viewing experience smooth, personalized, and enjoyable. Some of our key features include:
- Playback Speed Control: Adjust episode speed to match your viewing pace — slow down to savor moments or speed up when you’re short on time.
- Personal Watchlist: Easily organize and keep track of all the mini-series you want to watch.
- User-Friendly Interface: Navigate effortlessly through a sleek, intuitive design with stunning HD visuals that make every episode a pleasure to watch.

Global Appeal and Accessibility
Recognizing the global audience we serve, Meloshort supports:
- Multilingual Subtitles: Catering to viewers worldwide by providing subtitles in multiple languages.
- Localized Dubbing: Enjoy your favorite dramas in your native language with high-quality dubbing options.
From palace intrigues and CEO romances to campus crushes and emotional urban tales, Meloshort delivers a rich tapestry of stories that resonate across cultures and geographies.

Why Choose Meloshort?
- Optimized for Busy Lives: Episodes last just 1-2 minutes, perfect for watching on the go or during short breaks.
- High-Quality Content: Each drama is carefully selected or produced with cinematic quality, offering you an immersive viewing experience.
- Constantly Updated Library: Fresh content added weekly keeps the excitement alive and your watchlist full.
- Smart Recommendations: Our intelligent algorithm helps you find exactly the kinds of shows you’ll love.

Download Meloshort Today!
Join millions of viewers worldwide who have made Meloshort their go-to app for bite-sized entertainment. Experience fast, high-quality storytelling designed perfectly for your busy lifestyle. Download Meloshort now, start exploring the hottest popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series, and never miss a moment of great storytelling again!

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/meloshort/home/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://sites.google.com/view/meloshort/home/terms-of-use

eBoox – the most pleasant book reader ever! *
*according to my mom :)

• Cute, simple and useful UI,
• Effective reading tools: bookmarks, 3-colors highlights, interactive links and notes,
• Dark mode and offline reading,
• Customized settings - Fonts, Fields, Text size, screen Brightness, Page scrolling, ets.
• Suppots all your e-books, even in ZIP: EPUB, MOBI, DOC, DOCX, TXT, FB2, PRC, RTF, ODT, HTML, AZW, AZW3 and others text documents,
• PDF supported (beta),

• !Completely AD-FREE,
• !Online auto SYNC of ebooks and reading progress,
• !FREE WEB e-reader available!

Start reading your e-books right now! Upload books via iTunes, import your files from the email, web browser, cloud storages (iCloud, Google Drive, Dropbox, Yandex.Disk etc) or share via AirDrop.

In the app you will find detailed guide How to add ebooks in different ways. And we've already added three classic welcome books so you can appreciate the e-reader right away!

This is a upgraded version of eBoox. The old one is no longer supported. In order not to lose your books, progress, quotes and bookmarks, install this app version. Run it on device and wait for the data transfer to finish. When you make sure that all your books appeared in eBoox 2020, you can safely delete eBoox.old. You can turn on the synchronization for backup.

The “Little Stories” app is a collection of stories in which your child plays the main character. It's easy – enter your child’s name and gender into the settings window and enjoy reading stories about your son or daughter.

To make things even better, we've added beautiful soundtracks and detailed illustrations to accompany each story and help you raise your child in a positive environment. You can also make your own audiobooks! Take a few minutes to record yourself and your child will be able to listen to a charming audiobook in your voice!

If you like fairy tales, bedtime stories, or children’s books, then “Little Stories” is a great option for you! Let love and kindness fill your family’s leisure time!

Why “Little Stories”?
• 3500+ illustrations
• Illustrations will match your child’s gender
• 70+ exciting stories, and many more to come
• Enchanting music accompanying each story
• Create audiobooks by recording your voice!

We’d like to tell you a bit more about the process we use to create stories for your kids so that you have a better idea of the hard work we put into “Little Stories”.

1) We search for an author. Regardless of the writer’s nationality or language, we look for unique and captivating stories. Our main condition is that each bedtime story contains at most 50 scenes and is educational.

2) We create the storyboard. It consists of rough sketches that serve as the template for the finalized drawings in the storybook, helping us decide how it will look.

3) Once the storyboard has been approved by our team, we search for an illustrator. We take great pride in matching each artist with a story that suits their style. Personal touches make our bedtime stories for kids come to life!

4) At the same time, our composer begins creating the soundtrack for the story. Inspired by the theme of the tale, he designs a gentle melody that will transport your child to relaxation and sleep (maybe you too).

5) After the story is finished, we translate it so that the children of the world can enjoy it in their language.

6) The story is then published in our library of books for kids.

The entire process might take anywhere from two to nine months. We take great care to provide an amazing experience.

We are always adding new children's stories to our collection! 
Stories are suited for kids aged 3+.

Follow us on Instagram @diveomedia

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful!

ReadEra - a book reader, allows you to read books for free, text to voice and listen to books for free, offline, in the PDF, EPUB, DOC, DOCX, RTF, MOBI, AZW3, CBZ, CBR, DJVU, FB2, TXT, ODT and CHM formats.

No ads
Read books and listen to books without ads. The ReadEra app for reading books and viewing PDF documents neither contains ads nor imposes internal purchases.

No registration
We’ve made a fast, reliable reader that doesn't compel users to use any specific services. The book reader works offline and is entirely free. Read books for free and listen to books for free (TTS), without limits!

Text to Speech (TTS) 
Read text aloud with voice (TTS) – allows you to read text aloud and listen to all your books, PDF files and documents for free. With the Text to Speech (TTS) function, all your books and documents turn into audiobooks at the tap of the "Read aloud" button. TTS turns your book library into a personal audio library, making reading more flexible and enjoyable. This is especially useful for those who prefer the audio format or want to listen to books in situations where reading is impossible.
You can read foreign books and at the same time listen to the pronunciation of words and sentences. You can choose a voice, adjust the speech speed, turn on repeating text to voice of the selected text, word or sentence. 
Listen to books and documents with ReadEra while doing your things – on the go, working out, before bed and even when sleeping.

Read books of all formats
ReadEra is a set of reading apps in one app, which reads well multiple types of formats: book Epub, Kindle (MOBI, AZW3), Fb2; business PDF, Djvu; office Microsoft Word (DOC, DOCX, RTF), ODT; text TXT and others. Reading books, viewing Microsoft Word documents and PDF files from zip archives.
The reader for books, ReadEra, reads all popular formats of books, journals, articles and other documents in one app.

Best book manager for your library
Auto-detection of books and documents. Grouping books into lists: To Read, Have Read, Favorites. Sorting by name, file format, the last time read, etc. Quickly search for books, PDF files and documents in your library.

Navigation through a book
Quick access to reading settings, table of contents, your bookmarks, quotes, notes and other eBook options. Navigate through the book using the page index or the progress bar line.

Convenient reading settings
Auto-saving the current reading page. Comfortable color themes when reading books: day, night, sepia, console. Horizontal or vertical page flipping mode. Brightness and page margins adjustment, including PDF and DjVu. Separate settings for text and graphic formats. Adjustable type font, size, boldness, line spacing and hyphenation for Microsoft Word, Epub, Kindle (Mobi, Azw3), Fb2, TXT and ODT. Zoom in option for reading PDF and Djvu files.

Quotes and Notes
Create quotes and add notes to text. Highlight text in books, PDF files and documents, add personal notes to the highlighted text. A well-thought-out and simple algorithm for working with quotes and notes. All your quotes and notes in a book are conveniently gathered in one place—in the “About Document” section.

Bookmarks
Add bookmarks to save your favorite spots in books with a single tap. Just tap the upper-right corner while reading to quickly add a bookmark. All bookmarks for the book are conveniently gathered in one place—in the "About Document" section.

Text Translation
ReadEra supports integration with the iOS system “Translate” app for seamless text translation. Instantly translate text in books, PDFs, and documents using the built-in translator on your device.

Read books and Listen to books easily and for free with ReadEra!

Kur'ân, kalplere kuvvet ve gıdadır, ruhlara şifadır. Bu uygulama, Kuran-ı Kerim'i okurken anlamını daha iyi kavramanıza yardımcı olacak kullanışlı bir uygulama olarak hazırlandı..

Öne Çıkan Özellikler:

Okuma: Kuran-ı Kerim'in tam metnini içeren bu uygulama, Kuran'ı rahatlıkla okumanıza ve her ayeti incelemenize olanak tanır.

Türkçe Meal: Her ayeti okurken, aynı anda dokunarak Türkçe mealini gösterme seçeneği sayesinde Kuran'ın anlamını derinlemesine kavrayabilirsiniz.

Sure  Arama: İhtiyaç duyduğunuzda, sureleri hızlıca bulmanızı sağlayan kolay bir arama özelliği sunar.

İşaretlenen Sureler: Özel olarak işaretlenmiş veya sık olarak okuduğunuz sureleri sık kullanılanlara ekleyebilir ve kolayca erişebilirsiniz.

Kişiselleştirme: Sayfa zemin rengi gibi bazı seçeneklerle uygulamayı kendi isteğinize göre özelleştirebilirsiniz.

Bu uygulama, Kuran-ı Kerim'i daha derinlemesine anlama ve her an yanınızda taşıma imkanı sunar. Hem Kuran okuma pratiği yapabilir hem de mealini anında inceleyebilirsiniz.

From the makers of Quran.com comes Quran for iOS, a beautiful, and ad-free mushaf app. 

It’s now easier to read the Quran on the go, memorize it and listen to your favorite reciters.

This is just the beginning for Quran for iOS. We’ll be updating the app regularly insha'Allah and would love to hear your feedback and feature requests. You can reach us at ios@quran.com

As the Hadeeth (prophetic statement) in At-Tirmithi states: “Whoever reads a letter from the Book of Allah, he will have a reward, and this reward will be multiplied by ten. I am not saying that 'Alif, Laam, Meem' (a combination of letters frequently mentioned in the Holy Quran) is a letter, rather I am saying that ‘Alif’ is a letter, ‘Laam’ is a letter and ‘Meem’ is a letter.” [At-Tirmithi] We hope this app will help you increase your recitation of the Quran and increase your blessings in this world and the hereafter. 


من صناع Quran.com يأتي تطبيق القرآن للأجهزة المحمولة، تطبيق للمصحف ذو صفحات جميلة خالي تماما من الاعلانات.

لقد أصبح من السهل قراءة القرآن بالشارع، وحفظه، والاستماع إلى قارئك المفضل.

هذا هو مجرد بداية لتطبيق القرآن. سنعمل على تحديث التطبيق بشكل منتظم إن شاء الله، ونحب أن نسمع رأيك ومتطلبتك. يمكنك الوصول إلينا عن طريق البريد الإلكتروني ios@quran.com

عَنْ ابْنِ مَسْعُودٍ قَالَ : قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ { مَنْ قَرَأَ حَرْفًا مِنْ كِتَابِ اللَّهِ فَلَهُ حَسَنَةٌ وَالْحَسَنَةُ بِعَشْرِ أَمْثَالِهَا, لَا أَقُولُ الم حَرْفٌ, وَلَكِنْ أَلِفٌ حَرْفٌ, وَلَامٌ حَرْفٌ,وَمِيمٌ حَرْفٌ }. رَوَاهُ التِّرْمِذِيُّ. ونحن نأمل أن يساعدك هذا التطبيق على زيادة قراءتك للقرآن وزيادة حسناتك في الدنيا والآخرة.

Dua is the one of highest forms of worship. Nothing is more honorable to Allah Almighty than supplication.

This app is a collection of more than 260 authentic dhikr and duas from Holy Quran and Sunnah. It is based on the popular Hisnul Muslim (Fortress of the Muslim) book by Sheikh Sa'id Ibn Wahf Al-Qahtaani. In our app you will find most common duas which are for daily life. The app has a simple, clean and elegant design with many useful features such as audio recitation, favorites, notes, categories, search, share and daily notification for Morning and Evening dhikr according to prayer times in your region.

** Amazing Features of "Hisnul Muslim" **

• Completely free
- No ads
- No in-app purchases

• Themes:
- Multiple color themes (Light, Sepia, Brown)
- Night mode

• Reading:
- Reading with mode portrait or landscape
- Full screen mode for an enjoyable reading experience
- Screen will not turn-off while you are reading
- Last Read feature for all content
- Users can get their last reading point easily. They can start their reading from where they stopped
- Can use the volume keys to change pages without touching display

• Translations & transliterations:
- Translation languages: English, French, Deutsch, Russian, Turkish, Azerbaijani, Malay and Indonesian
- Arabic with transliteration (for assistance to those still learning Arabic)

• Font:
- Options to change font style and size of both Arabic and translation text
- Pinch to zoom to change the font size

• Share & Copy:
- Share a dua with your family and friends through social networks (such as Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, email, etc.)
- Share option lets one to distribute this beautiful app with loved ones
- Easy copy and share

• Bookmarks & Notes:
- Add your favorite Duas to "Bookmarks" to access it quickly
- Add notes during the reading and refer to them later
- Management of bookmarks and notes

• Search:
- Powerful Full-Text Search Engine with Highlights
- The Search history will list your latest 5 search history (You can also delete your search history)

• Audio recitations:
- Audio recitation for correct pronunciation
- Audio for each dua, listen & repeat (for memorization)
- Customizable audio repeat
- Offline use - once downloaded Audio no Internet connection required

• There are a total of 11 categories, including:
- Morning & Evening
- Home & Family
- Food & Fasting
- Joy & Distress
- Travel
- Prayer
- Supplication
- Hajj & Umrah
- Good Etiquette
- Nature
- Sickness & Death

• Some of the daily duas:
- In the morning and evening
- When waking up and before sleep
- Before dressing or undressing
- When going to / entering / leaving the mosque

• Notification
- You can create a reminder of the selected dua, at a certain time
- Smart alerts for Morning and Evening Dhikrs
- Daily Notification

• Various Customization Options & Others:
- Go to dua (By using this option, you can directly go to any dua of the book just by entering its number)
- Auto Night Mode
- Autoscroll feature
- Download All Audio
- Many other customization options


Use this app to pray and memorize the beautiful duas of the Messenger of Allah (peace be upon him).

Share and recommend this beautiful application to your friends and relatives. May Allah bless us in this world and hereafter.

Нельзя отменить приобретенную подписку в течение всего периода ее действия. Текущая активная подписка не может быть отменена. Любая неиспользованная часть бесплатного ознакомительного периода, если имеется, будет аннулирована при оформлении платной подписки на это издание.

Давайте знакомиться, мы — Читай-город! В нашем приложении, которое связывает интернет-магазин и более 500 книжных по всей стране, можно:

– Покупать книги, сувениры, канцелярию себе или в подарок. Можно воспользоваться услугой «Забрать за 1 час», выбрав самый удобный для вас способ получения. Или оформить экспресс-доставку — чтобы получить заветный томик скорее.

– Делать предзаказы на новинки. Многие из них есть только у нас, причём с эксклюзивными подарками!

– Получать рекомендации через сервис «Я в магазине». Выберите Читай-город, в котором находитесь, и мы покажем его новинки и топы — указав стеллаж и полку. Или введите название книги, которая интересует, чтобы узнать, где она стоит. Ещё можем посоветовать вам историю почти по любому запросу. Например, что-то о котиках ;)

– Быстро узнавать об акциях, скидках, получать и тратить бонусы.

– Выбирать книги на основе наших статей и советов от искусственного интеллекта CHIT-Ai. Он проанализирует, чем интересовались, и предложит истории специально для вас! 

– Купить электронный сертификат, который можно использовать и у нас в магазинах, и точно угадать с подарком — есть варианты в разных номиналах и дизайнах. Можем даже подсказать с пожеланием.

Программа лояльности Книголов

Книголов — единая программа лояльности Читай-города, Буквоеда, book24.ruи Литрес. С ней  вы сможете копить бонусы и оплачивать ими до 100% от стоимости покупки.

Фишки программы лояльности:

– Подарки для новых участников: 50 бонусов за регистрацию на кассе и 50 бонусов за подписку на рассылки. 

– Кешбэк до 15% за покупки. Чем больше покупаете – тем выше кешбэк. А для клиентов с Литрес Подпиской он специальный, целых 20%!

– Единый счёт: копите и тратьте бонусы на сайте, в приложении или в магазинах нашей сети, а ещё в Буквоеде, Литрес, Гоголь-Моголе и на сайте book24.ru.

– Простые условия: 1 бонус = 1 рубль. Бонусами можно оплатить до 100% от стоимости покупок.

– Секретные скидки и другие предложения для владельцев бонусной карты. 

– Бонусы в подарок: 100 в день рождения, до 30 за отзывы на сайте и не только.

Чтобы стать участником программы лояльности, зарегистрируйтесь в приложении и разрешите выпуск карты. Это займёт всего пару минут :)

Доставка

Получайте заказ любым удобным способом — курьером, Почтой России, в одном из наших магазинов или в пункте самовывоза. Доставка действует по всей стране.

– Бесплатная доставка в магазины Читай-города и партнёрской сети Буквоед.

– Более 1000 пунктов самовывоза по всей России.

– Курьерская экспресс-доставка по адресу всего за несколько часов.

– Бесплатная курьерская доставка при заказе от 2000 рублей.

– Доставка в подарок другому человеку – возможна, даже если вы не знаете адреса. Об упаковке тоже позаботимся!

В общем, у нас много фишек. А ведь это ещё не все ;) Скачивайте приложение и проверяйте сами!
